<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Client Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/clients/{client_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve detailed information about a specific client identified by ID.
